channel.title: DELTA How do I make a new group?
channel.description:
I keep asking this but people arnt understanding my question...
What Im asking is this: How can make a new group such as admin, mod, and owner. I want this group to have the same privileges as the default regular user (0). All I want is for these new groups to have the the Player-Rights = # to be 5...
Thanks, Hookahguru
P.S. I hope that was clear enough...lol

item.title: DELTA How do I make a new group?
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

I never heard of such a thing I know people make new status’s such as members and donors but I cant help you im a PI person I did Delta back in like 2006 lol.

Read full topic
item.source: DELTA How do I make a new group?
